name: Elizabeth S. PAOLUCCI, Appellee v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellant
name_abbreviation: Paolucci v. Unemployment Compensation Board of Review

parties: Elizabeth S. PAOLUCCI, Appellee v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is DISMISSED as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gerard Matthew Mackarevich, Com. of Pa., Governor’s Office of General Counsel, Carol J. Mowery, Pa. Dept, of Labor & Industry, for Unemployment Comp. Bd. of Review, Appellant.
Howard Andrew Rosen, H. Rosen Law, P.C., for Elizabeth Paolucci, Appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
141 A.3d 1237
Elizabeth S. PAOLUCCI, Appellee v. UNEMPLOYMENT COMPENSATION BOARD OF REVIEW, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 11, 2016.
Decided May 25, 2016.
Gerard Matthew Mackarevich, Com. of Pa., Governor’s Office of General Counsel, Carol J. Mowery, Pa. Dept, of Labor & Industry, for Unemployment Comp. Bd. of Review, Appellant.
Howard Andrew Rosen, H. Rosen Law, P.C., for Elizabeth Paolucci, Appellee.
